figures.title: Randomized Clinical Trial Study Design Flowchart
figures.description: This is a flowchart diagram illustrating the design of a randomized controlled trial (RCT) for myasthenia gravis patients. The study enrolls approximately 168 patients aged 18 or older with MGFA Class 1 ocular symptoms who are positive for acetylcholine receptor antibodies and on standard of care treatment. Participants are randomized 1:1 to receive either Gefurulimab plus standard of care (n=84) or placebo plus standard of care (n=84) for 12 weeks, with the primary endpoint being change from baseline in Myasthenia Gravis Impairment Index, followed by a 52-week open-label extension phase.
figures.caption: Study Design Schematic
